text: All the first fruits of the sanctuary which the children of Israel offer to the Lord, I have given to thee and to thy sons and daughters, by a perpetual ordinance. It is a covenant of salt for ever before the Lord, to thee and to thy sons.

segments.text: All the first fruits of the sanctuary which the children of Israel offer to the Lord, I
have given to thee and to thy sons and daughters, by a perpetual ordinance.
It is a covenant of salt for ever before the Lord, to thee and to thy sons.
